item.title: Week 05 - The Distribution of Random Variables
item.description: Handouts Equations Functions Lab Problem Set 04 Weekly Prep Lecture Slides Weekly Prep Instructions The instructions for this week’s weekly prep are available in the Week-05 GitHub repository. Make sure you submit your work and answers by the beginning of class on Monday! Replication Grappling with p-values Here are a couple of links for digging further into what p-values are and how we explain them:
